name: Goldyn Shower
author: WhoWattWhere
notes: Vanilla fishies. First ever KoG, 11-0 Plat to Legend 3, dead drew my way to Legend 1, then 15-0 to KoG. Messed around with different combos of CC, SRH, Econ, MW, and WoD. Settled with this after seeing positive recommendations about parallel and it worked a treat. Thanks Discord for the help!
